text.content: The chains give a little more. You feel that you could overcome them, if you only had a little more time—
But as you feel the flesh of your legs char, the fire spreads up your jacket and licks at your face. And you know you have run out of time.
You have burned to death in the Beacon.
Why not try again? By making different choices you may be able to escape or outwit the people of Emberhead.
铁链又松动了一点。你觉得你快要挣脱它了，只要再多一点时间——
但同时，你也感觉到自己的双腿在烤焦，火焰攀上了你的夹克，冲刷着你的脸。你意识到，你已经没时间了。
为何不重新尝试呢？选择不同的选项，你也许就能逃脱甚至智胜烬头村的村民了。
